text: During my last year in high school, I had to choose a field in which I wanted to study. It was a difficult choice because there are many varied fields. The areas I like were events and real estate but I chose the first one because I love organizing events and so I went to communication studies. My main source of inspiration was therefore the moments I spent organizing personal events and the fact that his task was important to me. I really like this. But it’s also the call I had with an event project load that helped me to confirm my choice of orientation. In fact, she explained to me her background as well as the skills to have, according to her, for this profession. She explained to me the different task she had to accomplish as well as the progress of the organization of an event. She told me about the different types of events, what it brought her. This call was very important to me and helped me in my choice of field of study. After this, I had to choose what kind of study I wanted like a license at college or a school or things a little bit like high school like a BTS. The license seemed a good idea for me and a way to change some air and be more autonomous. I also made choices by discussing and taking inspiration from older student and some events persons.
